title: # 414 - Jessica Kirson & ME
description:
Today I chat with comedian Jessica Kirson. We talk about what it was like growing up with Zach Braff as her step brother, perfect looking celebrities, Jessicas alter ego, drugs, rehab, and much more!  

Jessicas Twitter & Instagram: @JessyKirson 

Check out her podcast “Relatively Sane” wherever you get yours!

This episode is also brought to you by Whoop. Get 15% off your membership at http://www.whoop.com by using the promo code “BERT” at checkout

This episode is also brought to you by Tushy. Go to http://hellotushy.com/bertcast to get 10% off your order.

This episode is also brought to you by Omaha Steaks. Visit http://www.OmahaSteaks.com and type “BERT” in the search bar to get free shipping & free bacon for Father’s Day today.

My Brand new stand up special "Hey Big Boy" is streaming right now on Netflix! 

For all TOUR DATE & MERCH click HERE: http://www.bertbertbert.com 

Twitter: http://www.Twitter.com/bertkreischer Facebook: http://www.Facebook.com/BertKreischer 

Instagram: http://www.Instagram.com/bertkreischer 

Youtube: http://www.Youtube.com/user/Akreischer
